thread.title: Could China buy GlobalFoundries?
thread.title_full: Could China buy GlobalFoundries? - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Could China buy GlobalFoundries?
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - This summer GlobalFoundries took over IBM's chip making division.
The deal included the Essex plant and its 3,000 employees. But Global didn't buy the business. IBM paid them 1.5 billion dollars to take it, and when Global took control they reiterated their commitment to Vermont, vowing to invest further in the plant and its people.
Times have changed- Global's profits are down. They offered an early retirement package, and said layoffs could follow if not enough people take it. Now reports are circulating that the Chinese government wants to buy Global.
Watch the video for more information.
